## Convertible Note with Discount **Context:** Yara invested in a startup using a convertible note of **$1.442 million**, with a **20% discount**. When the company raised Series A at **$1.31 per share**, her note converted at the discounted price. ::: {.question-block}
âœ… Shares = Note / Discounted Price = 1.442 million / 1.048 = **1.376 million shares**
:::
